Title: Episode 764: You Have to Be Pretty Cynical
Description:
Jonathan Bennett and Kathrine Drickman talk to benny Vasquez of AlmaLinux all about the crazy trip we've all been on with enterprise Linux, details about the GPL, and how we've gotten to where we are with AlmaLinux. Along the way, the trio chats about the balancing act every project needs for long-term success, how to encourage everyone in the community, and why you really do need more than just programmers. Catch all this and more at FLOSS Weekly!

You can join the conversation in the Hackaday Discord, where the show records live each week. 

Theme music: "Newer Wave" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
